products.title: iPhone 12
products.description: The iPhone 12 display has rounded corners that follow a beautiful curved design, and these corners are within a standard rectangle

products.title: iPhone 13
products.description: The iPhone 13 Pro camera system lets you take macro photos and videos and improved low-light shots

products.title: iPhone 14
products.description: The major difference between iPhone 13 and 14 is the slightly faster A15 Bionic chip with a 5-core GPU and improved low-light camera performance in iPhone 14

products.title: iPhone 14 plus
products.description: The iPhone 14 Plus measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 16.95 centimetres (6.68″) diagonally (actual viewable area is less).

products.title: iPhone 15
products.description: The iPhone 15 still looks like the past few generations of iPhone, but its aluminum enclosure is now contoured to give it a more comfortable feel in the hand.

products.title: iPhone 15 plus
products.description: iPhone 15 plus measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 17.00 cm (6.69″) diagonally

products.title: iPhone 15 pro
products.description: Apple iPhone 15 Pro is powered by a hexa-core Apple A17 Pro processor. It comes with 8GB of RAM. The Apple iPhone 15 Pro supports wireless charging
